Title: Cowessess First Nation #73 Leadership & their Legal Counsel:  No More Delays!
Overview: The petition of concerned citizens of the Cowessess First Nation #73 draws to the attention of the elected Leadership of Cowessess First Nation #73 & to the Legal Counsel of individual Cowessess First Nation #73 Councillors that there are serious concerns. Of upmost concern is the interruption of programs & services including essential services to the Membership of Cowessess First Nation #73. As citizens of Cowessess First Nation #73 we ask that any legal proceedings that affect successful governance of Cowessess First Nation #73 proceed in the most efficient manner & timely location available to you at this time. It is our upmost concern that this dispute be resolved as soon as possible for the overall health & well being of our First Nation & in the best interests of fair representation for all Cowessess First Nation #73 Members.
Letter Body: Please do not allow for further delays of this important Federal Court Case. We want this resolved now!
